template.name: React Project Starter
template.description: A customizable React project template with optional features
template.schema_xml:
<folder name="%PROJECT_NAME%">
  <file name="package.json" />
  <file name="README.md" />
  <file name=".gitignore" />
  <folder name="src">
    <file name="index.tsx" />
    <file name="App.tsx" />
    <file name="App.css" />
    <if var="INCLUDE_COMPONENTS">
      <folder name="components">
        <file name="index.ts" />
      </folder>
    </if>
    <if var="INCLUDE_HOOKS">
      <folder name="hooks">
        <file name="index.ts" />
        <file name="useLocalStorage.ts" />
      </folder>
    </if>
    <if var="INCLUDE_UTILS">
      <folder name="utils">
        <file name="index.ts" />
      </folder>
    </if>
    <if var="STATE_ZUSTAND">
      <folder name="store">
        <file name="index.ts" />
        <file name="appStore.ts" />
      </folder>
    </if>
    <if var="STATE_REDUX">
      <folder name="store">
        <file name="index.ts" />
        <file name="store.ts" />
        <folder name="slices">
          <file name="index.ts" />
        </folder>
      </folder>
    </if>
  </folder>
  <if var="INCLUDE_TESTS">
    <folder name="tests">
      <file name="setup.ts" />
      <file name="App.test.tsx" />
    </folder>
  </if>
  <if var="INCLUDE_DOCKER">
    <file name="Dockerfile" />
    <file name="docker-compose.yml" />
    <file name=".dockerignore" />
  </if>
  <folder name="public">
    <file name="index.html" />
    <file name="favicon.ico" />
  </folder>
</folder>
